game_description: Manny Boxing VR is aimed at realistic Boxing games using virtual reality systems. If you want to enjoy Boxing through VR, Manny Boxing VR will be a choice without regret! features ●Boxing play with Manny Pacquiao ●Various boxing training modes - Mitt training ( with Manny ) - Dummy hitting practice - Punching speed ball - Heavy Bag Training ● Advanced AI divided by 5 difficulty levels ● Multiplayer boxing in real-time how to Play Boxing is a Dynamic sport played using gloves to hit opponent in the Boxing ring. Avoiding the opponent's attack, Attack your opponent in various ways. Challenge the best boxers!
review_1: Just like Manny Pacquia in the boxing world, this game is undoubtedly the leading VR game in boxing, restoring the most realistic boxing game!
